Macros
Command Codes
SPI_control command and status codes

Macros

#define SPI_CMD_LOOPBACK_ENABLE   (uint32_t)(SPI_CMD_RESERVED + 0)
 Command used by SPI_control to enable loopback.
 
#define SPI_CMD_SET_CLOCK_PHASEPOLARITY   (uint32_t)(SPI_CMD_RESERVED + 1)
 Command used by SPI_control to set Clock phase and polarity.
 

Detailed Description

SPI_CMD_* macros are general command codes for SPI_control(). Not all SPI driver implementations support these command codes.
